title: 请问大佬们是怎么开群峦传说服务端的
txt_content:
本人想开群峦传说服务端 自己尝试用 forge thermos 都是The state engine was in incorrect state CONSTRUCTING and forced into state SERVER_STOPPED. Errors may have been discarded.
求大佬给个解决方法

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
请使用服务器专用群峦传说
链接：https://pan.baidu.com/s/1HNMx4ezkhznWbV_F7vs27w 
提取码：7tf2

skyliye 发表于 2019-8-19 22:42
请使用服务器专用群峦传说
链接：https://pan.baidu.com/s/1HNMx4ezkhznWbV_F7vs27w 
提取码：7tf2 
不行 还是The state engine was in incorrect state CONSTRUCTING and forced into state SERVER_STOPPED. Errors may have been discarded.
